name: Galaxy Grip
description:
A Fearsome Intergalactic Thief is Raiding yet another Planet!

Andie, the Intergalactic Thief is an infamous space burglar, reached the bizzarre planet of the B-eye-ndits, a known reign of mostly harmless but wealthy creatures.

Andie is ready to throw some hands and steal some cash!

Goal: Steal the Great King Treasure! Controls
  • Move - WASD or ARROW KEYS
  • Jump - Z, J or SPACE
  • Grab and Throw - X. K or LEFT CLICK
  • Restart Run - R
A rich Movement Arsenal 

Andie isn't a rookie, not at all! 

She has a ton of ways she knows how to traverse many kinds of obstacles, like throwing an enemy downwards to gain more vertical speed, or jump canceling after using your grappling hook to follow it up with another grapple! 

Which combination of movements will make you the fastest, I wonder...


Credits Game design & Art
